sql:
SELECT a.id AS PHXal_a_id, a.idUser AS PHXal_idUser, a.title AS PHXal_title, a.hook AS PHXal_hook, a.content AS PHXal_content, a.url AS PHXal_url, a.date AS PHXal_date, a.idCateg AS PHXal_idCateg, c.id AS PHXal_c_id, c.name AS PHXal_name 
FROM `articles` a
INNER JOIN `categories` c ON c.id = a.idCateg
WHERE a.id=21
ORDER BY date DESC
